先说结论：好游戏，买买买！！

《传送门2》作为一款解密类fps（我都不知道还能不能叫它fps），其出色的游戏素质是有目共睹的：低配也能玩得转的并不过时的画面、流畅的操作、十分带感的BGM、单人剧情里幽默的对白、创意工坊里优秀作品的无限创意……这一切组成了这么一款艺术品。
游戏在关卡难度设置上循序渐进，刚入门的玩家并不会觉得太难。道具的多样化也另后期谜题的难度大增，自然，过关后的成就感也同步增长
游戏自带关卡编辑器，这令此游戏的游戏性可以说达到了无限——只要有玩家做实验室，就不愁没有游戏内容。当然，只有足够优秀的实验室才能让玩家们流连。
联机模式我还没试过（笔者还在创意工坊的单人实验室里挣扎），但两个人4个门……让人想想就觉得十分激动——难度呈指数增长……

非要我说缺点的话……这游戏的确比较容易造成眩晕——注意，我说的不是普通意义上的3D眩晕…而是连续变换视角带来的眩晕感……
尤其是用动量法则解密时……就连我这样的fps老手第一次玩时也感到头晕……

强力推荐！！3D眩晕症状严重者慎入！

The cake is a lie, but the Portal games certainly take it as my favorite puzzle games of all time. I've actually played this game on console, and played through both the solo and co-op campaigns multiple times. This is the sequel that Portal deserved for a couple of reasons:

First off, the story falls right in line with the first game. It's in depth, and builds heavily around a tight group of fully fleshed out characters.

Secondly I'd like to bring up gameplay. Just like the first one, no corners were cut with the physics in this game. The fact that the player can move so smoothly through the wide open test chambers makes the visuals that much more enjoyable, because there really are a number of awe-inspiring scenes.

Lastly I'd like to note why I bought this game a second time when I'd already played a considerable amount of it on console. I bought it for the community contributions and map editor. Playing fan-made solo and co-op maps are often more fun and more thought provoking than the actual puzzles in the game. The ability just to mess around in the map creator (with an EXTREMELY intuitive interface none-the-less) justified my second purchase of the game.

This is the most awesome, addicting, challenging game ever made. I just can't stop playing. I started playing from the day it was launched, I finished the main story at least 10 times in different manners, the cooperative story 3 times and I just can't stop playing!

The story is amazing, both if you understand everything or you don't know the first Portal's references. You get into Wheatley's tale, you get really mad at GLaDOS, then you get disturbed for knowing the truth, you fall in love with Caroline, and the end of the game makes me shiver. Every. Freaking. Time.

It's the perfect puzzle: it increasingly pushes you to your limits on thinking the solutions. Every level reinforces your skills while still teaching you more. That's just the perfect way for me to learn something, and this game is cream of the crop of puzzles.

I really recommend this game for everyone, and also if you feel like, try the first game too, because the story will go deeper and you will understand why I am so addicted and passionate about this game.
